title: Bifrost Helm Chart Values
description: Schema for Bifrost Helm chart values.yaml

tag.description: Image tag (required - validated at template render time)

pricingUrl.description: Custom pricing URL (optional, can be empty)

push_gateway.description: Configuration for pushing metrics to a Prometheus Push Gateway for multi-node cluster deployments

enabled.description: Whether to enable pushing metrics to the Push Gateway

push_gateway_url.description: URL of the Prometheus Push Gateway (e.g., http://pushgateway:9091)

instance_id.description: Instance identifier for grouping metrics. If not set, hostname is used automatically.

push_interval.description: How often to push metrics in seconds

basic_auth.description: Basic authentication credentials for the Push Gateway

keys.description: API keys for embedding provider (required when enabled)

routingRules.description: Routing rules for dynamic provider/model selection based on CEL expressions

udpBroadcastPort.description: UDP broadcast port (0 means not configured)

provider.description: SAML provider type (empty when not configured)
